name: European DIGITAL SME Alliance
goal: The aim of organisation is to represent the interests of small and medium enterprises (SMEs) working in digital sector. The organisation provides a voice for ICT SMEs in the European policy making, business and standartisation areas.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives: ICT standardisation, European Data Economy, Digital skills and jobs, cPPP on cybersecurity, General Data Protection Regulation, EU Social Dialogue, The European Cloud Initiative
